channel.title: Frame and Load-fill colors
channel.description:
I need help changing the colors of my client frame and the load fill bar.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/3938/greenub5.png[/img][/URL] Ive tried changing everything that said green, but it just wont change... If anyone can help me change it would be really appreciated. THANKS!

item.title: Frame and Load-fill colors
item.dc:creator: @0wn4g3sc4p3 0wn4g3sc4p3
item.description:
@0wn4g3sc4p3 wrote:

Wow, this stuff is alot more complicated then i thought…I mean, to change a few colors all these things need to be changed. lol.

Im beginning to feel that i dont even have the slightest bit of mental capacity to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Frame and Load-fill colors
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

You see how it says “new ColorTheme,” how about searching for which one is black, and then using the number to identify which color to use, so you will need to find the int.

Hint: it is above the look and feel methods.

As for that link, it is Java code colors, which are used to change the color of the loading bar and other font colors and such when the correct statement is found.

Read full topic

item.title: Frame and Load-fill colors
item.dc:creator: @0wn4g3sc4p3 0wn4g3sc4p3
item.description:
@0wn4g3sc4p3 wrote:

I admit, I am a beginner(what most of the people here call a “Noob!”) I appreciate what you’ve provided me with. Thanks =)

EDIT
And as for what that link leads to, i have no clue what it is. -.-

RE-EDIT

if(theme == 1) { // Black
MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new GreenTheme());
} else if(theme == 2) { // Black
MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new RedTheme());
} else if(theme == 3) { // Black
MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new BlackTheme());
MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new BlackTheme());
} else if(theme == 4) { //Orange
MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new OrangeTheme());
}
Thats everything in Gui.java that has something to do with ‘look and feel’. Ive tried changing the Green to Black, but i just get errors when compiling. Im really dumbfounded.

Read full topic

item.title: Frame and Load-fill colors
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It’s obvious you’re using zdr client, in which you need to go into your Gui.java and search for a method associated with look and feel. I won’t say which one. Then you need to find the int that declares which look and feel color is used.

To change the loading bar, don’t you think that searching for the text seen while the loading bar is seen would help. This link should be of some assistance to you.
http://mindprod.com/jgloss/netscapehtml.html

Read full topic
